component.name: AndroidMic
component.summary: Use your Android phone as a mic for your PC
Utilisez votre téléphone Android comme micro pour votre PC

description.p: AndroidMic lets you use your Android device as a microphone for your PC. This tool supports multiple connection methods, including TCP, UDP, USB serial, and USB ADB. Stream audio directly from your phone's microphone to your PC with minimal setup and flexibility in choosing audio formats and output devices.

ul.li: Connect via TCP/UDP over the same network or USB cable
Supports advanced audio settings like sample rate, channels, and format
Audio wave to visualize the sound

description.p: To get started, compile the Android app via Android Studio. Configure connection settings and audio formats to match between both applications. Detailed instructions for each platform are provided in the README file on the app's repository.
